law.catch_line: Filing fees paid by candidates under § 5-401 of this subtitle shall be distributed as specified in ...

text.section: Filing fees paid by candidates under § 5-401 of this subtitle shall be distributed as specified in this section.
Filing fees received by a local board shall be transferred to the governing body of the county.

Filing fees received by the State Board shall be divided and distributed:
with respect to candidates for statewide office:
$60 to the Baltimore City Board of Elections; and
$10 each to each other local board;
with respect to candidates for any other public or party office in a multicounty district, in equal amounts to the local board of each county that contains part of the district to which the candidacy relates; and
with respect to a candidate for a public or party office in a district wholly contained within one county, to the local board of that county.
